hero.headline: Speak English with
hero.description: 1-to-1 English coaching designed for adults who understand the language but struggle to speak it. Build real communication skills in a safe, judgment-free environment.

introVideo.title: A Message from
introVideo.watchVideo: Watch: A Message from Your Teacher
introVideo.whoIAmText: I'm Said, a Moroccan English teacher with years of experience helping adults gain confidence in speaking. I focus on practical, real-life English, not textbook perfection. My goal is to help you speak clearly, naturally, and confidently in any situation.
introVideo.whoThisIsForText: Adults who understand English but struggle to speak it. Professionals, job seekers, or anyone who feels stuck and wants to finally communicate fluently.
introVideo.whatMakesDifferentText: Lessons are personalized for your goals, not a generic curriculum. You speak more than you listen, practice real conversations, and get feedback that actually helps you improve.
introVideo.noPressureText: A safe, supportive environment where mistakes are part of learning. Learn at your pace, and grow at your rhythm.

whyTakalam.title: Why
whyTakalam.subtitle: This isn't just another English course. It's a different approach to learning.
whyTakalam.audienceSubtitle: If any of these goals resonate with you, we should talk.
whyTakalam.audience1Desc: Lead meetings, present ideas, and communicate with international clients without second-guessing yourself.
whyTakalam.audience2Desc: You understand everything but freeze when speaking? We'll unlock your voice through guided conversation practice.
whyTakalam.audience3Desc: Practice answering tough questions, introduce yourself naturally, and make a great impression in English.
whyTakalam.audience4Desc: Targeted preparation for IELTS, TOEFL, Duolingo English Test (DET), and other international exams.
whyTakalam.audience5Desc: Emails, presentations, negotiations, and client calls. Communicate professionally in any business setting.
whyTakalam.audience6Desc: Planning to study, work, or travel abroad? English is your passport. We'll help you use it with confidence.

rules.pageSubtitle: Please read these terms carefully before booking your sessions. By registering with Takalam, you agree to these policies.
rules.payment1: All payments must be made in advance before sessions begin.
rules.payment2: We accept bank transfers (CIH Bank) and PayPal payments.
rules.payment3: Payment proof (screenshot) must be sent via WhatsApp after completing the registration form.
rules.payment4: Sessions will only be scheduled after payment is verified.
rules.payment5: Package prices are fixed as listed on the website. Special requests may have different pricing.
rules.refund1: Full refund available if you cancel before your first session.
rules.refund2: Partial refunds (minus completed sessions) available within the first week of starting your package.
rules.refund3: No refunds after the first week of your package has started.
rules.refund4: Unused sessions from packages cannot be refunded after 3 months from the purchase date.
rules.refund5: Refunds are processed within 7-10 business days to your original payment method.
rules.reschedule1: Sessions can be rescheduled with at least 24 hours notice at no extra cost.
rules.reschedule2: Rescheduling requests should be made via WhatsApp.
rules.reschedule3: Same-day rescheduling is subject to availability and may not always be possible.
rules.reschedule4: Each session can only be rescheduled once. Further changes may count as a cancellation.
rules.reschedule5: Rescheduled sessions must be completed within your package validity period.
rules.cancel1: Cancellations with less than 24 hours notice will result in the session being marked as completed.
rules.cancel2: No-shows (missing a session without notice) will be counted as a completed session.
rules.cancel3: If you need to cancel your entire package, contact us as soon as possible for refund eligibility.
rules.cancel4: Repeated last-minute cancellations may result in restrictions on future bookings.
rules.session2: Sessions are conducted via Zoom or Google Meet. The link will be shared before each session.
rules.session3: Please ensure you have a stable internet connection and a quiet environment.
rules.session4: Camera on is recommended for better interaction, but not mandatory.
rules.session5: Be ready at least 5 minutes before your scheduled session time.
rules.session6: If the teacher is unable to attend, the session will be rescheduled at no cost to you.
rules.comm1: Primary communication is through WhatsApp for scheduling and quick questions.
rules.comm2: Response time is typically within 24 hours on business days.
rules.comm3: For urgent matters, please send a WhatsApp message clearly marked as urgent.
rules.comm4: Email (takalamenglishcenter@gmail.com) is available for formal inquiries.
rules.package1: Single sessions must be used within 2 weeks of purchase.
rules.package2: Weekly packages must be completed within 2 weeks of the start date.
rules.package3: Monthly packages must be completed within 5 weeks of the start date.
rules.package4: Trimester packages must be completed within 4 months of the start date.
rules.conduct1: Treat each session with respect and professionalism.
rules.conduct2: Inappropriate behavior or language will result in immediate session termination without refund.
rules.conduct3: Recording of sessions is not permitted without prior written consent.
rules.conduct4: We reserve the right to refuse service to anyone who violates these terms.
rules.questionsText: If you have any questions about our policies, don't hesitate to reach out.

faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before getting started.
faq.q1: What level of English do I need to start?
faq.a1: Any level! Whether you're a complete beginner or advanced speaker looking to refine your skills, lessons are personalized to your current level and goals.
faq.q2: What if I miss a scheduled session?
faq.a2: You can reschedule with 24 hours notice at no extra cost. Sessions missed without notice are counted as completed. See our full policy on the Terms & Policies page.
faq.a3: Just a smartphone, tablet, or computer with a stable internet connection. We use Zoom or Google Meet - both are free and easy to use.
faq.a4: Each session is 50 minutes long - enough time to make real progress while keeping you engaged and focused.
faq.q5: Can I change my package later?
faq.a5: Yes! You can upgrade to a larger package anytime. Contact us to discuss your options and we'll help you transition smoothly.
faq.q6: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a6: We accept bank transfers (CIH Bank) and PayPal. Payment must be completed before your first session.
faq.q7: How do I schedule my sessions?
faq.a7: After registration, you'll book sessions directly through our calendar. Choose times that work for your schedule - we offer flexible slots.
faq.a8: We don't offer free trials, but you can start with a single session (200 DHS) to experience the Takalam method before committing to a package.
